name: Master Shot VR
description: Master Shot VR: Real guns, live competition Take your best shot with Master Shot VR, the live multiplayer virtual shooting competition. Fire an arsenal full of realistic weapons from automatic pistols to sub-machine guns at drone targets and zombie hordes and out-trash-talk your opponent.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
